author: ravi00091
title: Recommend some budget hotel/lodge/dorm for 5 person
text: India Mike » India Travel » States in India » Goa » Recommend some budget hotel/lodge/dorm for 5 person Recommend some budget hotel/lodge/dorm for 5 person First time we are going to Goa in October last week. Kindly recommend some budget accommodation either Lodge or Dorm for 5 person in Margaon and panjim. Budget- Price per day from 500-1000 rs for 5 persons OR
